command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Remove-SysmonRuleFilter -Path .\pc_marketing.xml -EventType NetworkConnect -Condition Image -EventField Image -Value $images -Verbose VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files (x86)\PuTTY\putty.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files (x86)\PuTTY\plink.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files (x86)\PuTTY\pscp.exe removed. VERBOSE: Filter for field Image with condition Image and value of C:\Program Files (x86)\PuTTY\psftp.exe removed.
EventType : NetworkConnect Scope : All Events DefaultAction : Exclude Filters :

dev:remarks.maml:para: Remove a series of filter where a list f values are saved in a array.
